title: React & Next.js Developer
description: Building fast, scalable web interfaces with React and Next.js—specialized in dynamic UIs, smooth routing, and interactive experiences.

title: MERN Stack Developer
description: Developing full-stack apps with MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js. Delivering scalable solutions with secure APIs and clean backend logic.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Designing intuitive interfaces with Figma, emphasizing usability, accessibility, and smooth user flows across all screen sizes.

title: Graphic Designer
description: I create visuals like logos, posters, and social media graphics using Photoshop and Illustrator — combining creativity with brand consistency.

title: Responsive Web Design
description: Crafting adaptive layouts with Tailwind CSS and Flexbox to ensure consistent user experiences across all devices.

title: Interaction & Prototyping
description: Bringing interfaces to life with animations, transitions, and micro-interactions using Figma, GSAP, or Framer Motion.
